strym.tools.threept_center¶

strym.tools.threept_center(x1, x2, x3, y1, y2, y3)¶

Calculates center coordinate of a circle circumscribing three points

Parameters
x1 : double

First x-coordinate

x2 : double

Second x-coordinate

x3 : double

Third y-coordinate

y1 : double

First y-coordinate

y2 : double

Second y-coordinate

y3 : double

Third y-coordinate

Returns

double, double – Returns center coordinates of the circle. Return None, None if the determinant is zero
